    #include <iostream>
     using namespace std;
    int main() {
    int a,b,c;
    
    while(1)
    {cin>>a>>b>>c;
    if((a==0)&&(b==0)&&(c==0))
    {break;}
    else if((b-a)==(c-b))
    { cout<<"AP "<<c+(b-a);
    cout<<endl;}
    else
    {cout<<"GP "<<c*(b/a)<<endl;}
    }
    return 0;
    }
